column4: I'm trying to help an ubuntu user in #apache. Can someone please tell me the def documentroot in ubuntu?
/var/www . If you haven't played with debian based apache configs, you will be confused ;)
Indeed. No /var/www/{html,cgi-bin}  and so forth. Huh...
http.conf is all broken up into /etc/apache2.conf, mods-enabled and sites-enabled, and conf.d,
